ROLE_USER_ROLE_CREATE.name: ROLE_USER_ROLE_CREATE
ROLE_USER_ROLE_CREATE.description: Can create a role, but not edit.

ROLE_USER_ROLE_EDIT.name: ROLE_USER_ROLE_EDIT
ROLE_USER_ROLE_EDIT.description: Can edit a role's name and assigned groups or users.

ROLE_USER_ROLE_VIEW.name: ROLE_USER_ROLE_VIEW
ROLE_USER_ROLE_VIEW.description: Can view a role and its assigned users and groups.

ROLE_USER_USER_CREATE.name: ROLE_USER_USER_CREATE
ROLE_USER_USER_CREATE.description: Can create/register a new user, but not edit.

ROLE_USER_USER_EDIT.name: ROLE_USER_USER_EDIT
ROLE_USER_USER_EDIT.description: Can edit a user, including roles and groups.

ROLE_USER_USER_VIEW.name: ROLE_USER_USER_VIEW
ROLE_USER_USER_VIEW.description: Can view a user and its assigned groups and roles.

ROLE_USER_GROUP_CREATE.name: ROLE_USER_GROUP_CREATE
ROLE_USER_GROUP_CREATE.description: Can create a group name, but not edit.

ROLE_USER_GROUP_EDIT.name: ROLE_USER_GROUP_EDIT
ROLE_USER_GROUP_EDIT.description: Can edit a group name and assign users or roles.

ROLE_USER_GROUP_VIEW.name: ROLE_USER_GROUP_VIEW
ROLE_USER_GROUP_VIEW.description: Can view a group name and its users or roles.
